field.name: summary
field.value: Replace EmailSender classes with .Net CLR equivalent ones

field.name: description
field.value: Removing Message, MessageAttachment and MessageAttachmentCollection classes from EmailSender project and replace them with MailMessage, Attachment and AttachmentCollection (the .net clr equivalent). See http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/ccfe27022545dca for more info.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: I've submitted 3 patch files that need to be applied. - EmailSender.patch is for the EmailSender project - Monorail.patch is to update the monorail project to use the new api - Samples.patch updates the samples

comment.author: josh_robb
comment.text: As agreed on mailing list - this is an unnecessary breaking change for users.

comment.author: josh_robb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Won't Fix''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
